title: Heston's smoked salmon and scrambled eggs

ingredients.item: 350g egg (about 7 large Waitrose British Blacktail Free Range Eggs)
100g Heston from Waitrose Lapsang Souchong Tea Smoked Salmon, finely sliced
Acidulated beurre noisette or acidulated brown butter (see tip)

instructions.step: Using a fork, mix the eggs, milk, cream and butter together in a heatproof bowl. Season with salt and stir to combine.
Place the bowl over a pan of simmering water and allow to cook really slowly using a spatula to continuously stir the mixture. Cook until the eggs begin to scramble – this should take 15–20 minutes.
To serve, place the scrambled egg on your favourite toast, top with Heston’s Tea Smoked Salmon then season with the acidulated beurre noisette (see tip).
